response.original_title: Reasonable Doubt: Horror in Hocking County
response.overview: A Logan, Ohio father, accused of murdering and dismembering his stepdaughter and her fiance, was sentenced to die in the electric chair. Horror in Hocking County: a true crime account of parental hysteria and the aftermath in Logan. Johnston's conviction by a three-judge panel was later reversed by the Ohio Court of Appeals. And that decision was subsequently upheld by Ohio's Supreme Court.
response.title: Reasonable Doubt: Horror in Hocking County
